sense.gloss: yao (line representing yin or yang that comprises one third of a trigram)
yang yao (unbroken line composing one third of a trigram)
yin yao (broken line composing one third of a trigram)
commentary (on any of the 384 lines of the hexagrams in the Book of Changes)

yang yao (unbroken line composing one third of a trigram)
yin yao (broken line composing one third of a trigram)
